string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Everybody can tell you how to do it, they never did it."
"Only time they excited is when they mentioning Shawn."
"I'd rather die enormous than live dormant."
"I'm far from being God, but I work God damn hard."
"The average rap life is two or three albums. You're lucky to get to your second album in rap!"
"They say a midget standing on a giant's shoulders can see much further than the giant. So I got the whole rap world on my shoulders, they trying to see further than I am."
"He who does not feel me is not real to me, Therefore he doesn't exist. So, poof... vamoose, son of a bitch."
"I'm not a 'Business-Man'! I'm a Business... man! Let me handle my business, damn!"
"I'd rather die enormous than live dormant."
"No matter where you go, you are what you are playa."
"When the grass is cut, the snakes will show."
"He who does not feel me is not real to me, therefore he does not exist. So, poof... vamoose, son of a bitch."
"Make these words find a spot on your brain and burn."
"You haven't heard stress until you heard the cries of my mama."
"Niggas is hotheads and the bullets is heat seeking."
"Pussy is one of the most powerful things in the world, and a lot of people don't understand how powerful pussy is."
"Said she liked my necklace, started relaxin - now that's what the fuck i call a chain reaction."
"Ma, cry me a river, build a bridge, and GET OVER IT!"
"I've got an appetite for destruction - but i scrape the plate."
"This is food for thought, u do the dishes!"
"What you eat dont make me shit."
"Being broke is childish and i'm quite grown."
"Couldn't sit down, big gun kept stickin' my pelvis Shit, it was either that or be living with Elvis."
"Niggas wanna hijack the flyness."
"Different toilet, SAME SHIT, and i'm sick of explaing this.."
"Swear to everything when i leave this earth gonna be on both feet, never knees in the dirt - lucky me."
"They say a midget standing on a giant's shoulders can see much further than the giant. So I got the whole rap world on my shoulders, they trying to see further than I am."
"I'd rather die enormous than live dormant."
"Can I live?"
"I will not lose, for even in defeat, there's a valuable lesson learned, so it evens up for me."
"If you dont gimme heaven i'll raise hell.. 'till its heaven."
"How you get so fly? From not being afraid to fall out the sky."
"Ain't nothin' wrong with the aim, just gotta change the target."
"If ya'll can't already see I ain't worried about ya'll cause I'm already me."
"Lord forgive me I never would've made it without sin."
"Middle finger to the law, nigga grippin' my balls."
"Remind yourself. Nobody built like you, you design yourself."
"Life is for living. Not living uptight."
"Sisters hold you down, bitches hold you up. Sisters help you progress, bitches'll slow you up."
"You ain't seen money in your life, when it comes to this cheese ya'll like three blind mice."
"When you first come in the game, they try to play you. Then you drop a couple of hits, look how they wave to you"
"No one on the corner gotta bop like this, can't wear skinny jeans cause my knots don't fit"
"Lets get faded, Le Meurice for like 6 days. Gold bottles, scold models, Spillin Ace on my sick Js."
"Yall dont know that dont sh*t phase me. The Nets could go 0-82 and I look at you like this sh*t gravy."
"Whats 50 grand to a muhf*kaa like me? Can you please remind me?"
"Represent, Watch The Throne, niggall be pissed off. Earth is boring to im, shit is makin my dick soft."
"Im out here ballin, I know yall hear my sneaks. Jesus was a carpenter, Yeezy, laid beats. Hova flow the Holy Ghost, get the hell up out your seats...Preach."
"Tears on the mauseoleum floor. Blood stains the coliseum doors. Lies on the lips of a priest. Thanksgiving disguised as a feast."
"Uh, everythings for sale, I got 5 passports Im never going to jail."
"I invented swag...Poppin bottles putting supermodels in the cab."
"B**ch behave, just might let you meet Ye, Chi towns D. Rose, Im movin the Nets to BK."
"I wish I could give you this feelin, Im planking on a million. Im riding through yo hood, you can bank I aint got no ceiling."
"Mummy wrap the kids, have em cryin for they mummy back. Dummy that your daddy is, tell em I just want my racks."
"Wassup, mafucka, where my money at? You gon make me come down to your house where yo mummy at."
"Bueller had a Mueller, but I switched it for a Mille. Cause Im richer, and prior to this shit was movin freebase."
"Driving Benzes, wit no benefits. Not bad huh? For some immigrants."
"I mean Marilyn Monroe, shes quite nice but why all the pretty icons always all white. Back to my Beyonces, you deserve 3 stacks for the Andre."
"Go harder than a n-gga for a n-gga go figure. Told me keep my own money if we ever did split up. How can somethin so gangsta be so pretty in pictures?"
"Look a man dead in his eyes. So he know you talk truth when you speak it, give your word, keep it."
"Took me 26 years to find my path. My only job is cuttin the time in half."
"Sorry junior, I already ruined ya Cause you aint even alive, paparazzi pursuin ya. Sins of a father make yo life ten times harder I just wanna take ya to a barber."
"Im losing myself, Im stuck in the moment. I look in the mirror, My only opponent."
"Im a tortured soul, I live in disguise. Rest in peace to the leader of the Jackson 5."
"Move blocks and squares, move apples and pears. Work pots and pans, just to cop me some Airs."
"Black Axl Rose, move halfs and wholes. Come down to the jungle, just ask for Hov."
"Now shoot trigga, stop looking at her tits. Get ya own dog, ya heard. Thats my bitch!"
"You belong with n-ggas who used to be known for dope dealing. You too dope for any of those civilians."
"Beat the odds, beat the Feds. It wouldnt be wise, to bet against the kid."
"Who gon stop me? No brakes, I need, State Farm. So many watches I need 8 arms. One neck but got 8 charms."
"Black cards, black cars, Black on black, black broads. Whole lotta money in a black bag. Black strap, you know what thats for?"
"No crying in public, just lying to judges. Risking my life, Im already dying, so f*ck it well."
"I went through hell, Im expecting heaven."
"Middle finger to my old life, special shout out to my old head. If it wasnt for your advice, A ni**a would have been so dead."
"2 seats in the 911. No limit on the black card. Told yall I was gonna go HAM, to the ocean was my backyard."
"Ok here, like a hare, like a rabbit, I like karatsl Im allergic to having bunny ears, like broke, like nope, like ha, I aint no joke."
"Only spot a few blacks the higher I go. Whats up to Will, shoutout to O."
"In sheepskin coats, I silence the lamb. Do you know who I am Clarice? No cheap cologne whenever I shh-shh. Success never smelled so sweet."
"Its a celebration of black excellence. Black tie, black Maybachs. Black excellence, opulence, decadence. Tuxes next to the president."
"I arrived on the day Fred Hampton died. Real niggas just multiply and they say 21 I was supposed to die. So Im out here celebratin my post demise."
"All black everything, Ni**a you know my fresh code. Im out here fightin for you, dont increase my stress load."
"Too much enemy fire to catch a friendly."
"I spent about a minute, maybe less on it. Fly pelican fly, turn the jets on it but first I shall digress on it."
"Fu*k you squares, the circle got smaller. The castle got bigger, the walls got taller."
"When the grief is over, beef is over, Ill be fly when Easters over. I tried to teach niggas how to be kings and all they ever wanted to be was soldiers."
"Same people that I fought for. That I fight for, that I ride for. That I live for, that I die for. Be the reason that these niggas is alive for."
"Our apple pie was supplied through Arm and Hammer. Straight out the kitchen, shh dont wake Nana!"
"F**k your awards like Eddie Murphys couch. The Roc is in the building we should have stayed in the house."
"Elvis has left the building now. Im on the Beatles ass Ni**as hear Watch The Throne, yeah its like the Beatles back."
"King Hov, Im exactly what the f**k you think. 11 in a row, Bill Russell rings."
"Michael Jordan swag. Yall think Michael Jordan bad. Nigga I got a 5 more rings than Michael Jordan had."
"Im bullet proof, b**ch you cant get nothin past me."
"Give all glory to Gloria, they said "you raised that boy too fast, but you was raising a warrior." We victorious, they'll never take the joy from us."
"New money, I found the fountain of youth. Im headed to Miami to f**k up the Fontaine Bleu."
"As far as them 16s, Im 23 of it all Primetime, riding that 6 deuce. That 9-11 I only subtract the roof."
"At 42 be better than 24, I carried the 4-5, mastered 48 laws."
"Mo money, 40 year old phenom. Our 15 minutes of fame has stretched beyond."
"This is where DiNero would be if he aint turn back. F**k Sosa, this Hova this is real life. This is what the ending of Scarface should feel like."
"Just a f***in waste of time, a complete waste of bottles. Ni**as fashion is weak, they be wastin all the models."
